content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER, warning: [not receiving electricity]).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) (status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings [not connected to power network, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with warning [out of fuel]; it holds a fluid box with approximately 189.89 units of water at temperature 15, with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5), and is linked to fluid system [75310].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) (status: WORKING) delivering about 99.26 units of water, with a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) linked to fluid system [75310].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 75310 (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system = 75309 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system = 75322 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system = 75321 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 75317 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system = 75326 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system = 75325 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 75328 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system = 75329 (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system = 75330 (status: EMPTY).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Inventory Attribute Access:
  - Validate attribute references when printing inventory items. Ensure that the item object supports the accessed attributes (avoid using, for example, item.prototype_name on a string) to prevent AttributeError.
  
• Steam Engine Repositioning:
  - Prior to repositioning the steam engine, verify that candidate pipe groups with the specified fluid system are present within the defined search radius. Repeated repositioning attempts using fluid_system values [74564, 74812, 74978, 75062, 75144, 75228] have failed; adjust search parameters or examine the spatial layout and configuration of nearby pipeline infrastructure.
